definition: Lion city, nickname for Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]

sentences.english: According to government mandate in the Lion City, tipping is not permitted.
sentences.chinese: 根據獅城政府的規定，給小費是不允許的。

sentences.english: Wonder why now it's the best time to experience the roaring Singapore?
sentences.chinese: 想知道爲什麼現在就是體驗狂歡獅城的最佳時機嗎？

sentences.english: Wonder why there's no better time to experience the Roar of the Lion City?
sentences.chinese: 想知道爲什麼現在就是體驗狂歡獅城的最佳時機嗎？

sentences.english: "Triple-Romania letter" in Malay and Italy as "Singapore.
sentences.chinese: “信訶補羅”在馬來文中意爲“獅城”。

sentences.english: I had stayed in the Lion City then already. in this evening, I receive a phone call from one of my friends there.
sentences.chinese: 當時已經於獅城住，今晚當地的朋友撥電話來了。

sentences.english: I do always compare myself nowadays with the one as the time when I just arrived in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 總是一次次地拿現在的自己跟當初剛來獅城的我相比。

sentences.english: I first visited Singapore in early 1997.
sentences.chinese: 第一次來獅城是在1997年初。

definition: Huaiji county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong
Yangdong county in Yangjiang 陽江|阳江[Yang2 jiang1], Guangdong
Yan and Zhao, two of the Warring States in Hebei and Shanxi/beautiful women/women dancers and singers
to become known far and wide (idiom)/famous
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
both the guests and the hosts thoroughly enjoy themselves (idiom)
to pass on the light of Buddha
Longnan prefecture-level city in south Gansu
